title: THE STATE OF JAMMU AND KASHMIR vs FARID AHMAD TAK
doc: "The Translated judgment in vernacular language is meant for the restricted use of the litigant to understand it in his/her language and may not be used for any other purpose.For all practical and official purposes,the English version of the judgment shall be authentic and shall hold the field for the purpose of execution and implementation"
author: HON'BLE THE CHIEF JUSTICE
